h3.a: Remote Learning Through End of Year

div.p:
Please see these pages for more information.
Remote Learning Plan and Resources - https://www.olchs.org/academics/elearning/
Please visit our COVID-19...

As a diverse and inclusive 21st-Century school, our mission is to graduate students prepared for future success through a safe, supportive, and intellectually challenging environment committed to the values of Spartan PRIDE.

The online application for the Class of 2020 Spartan Educational Foundation scholarship program is now active for students. Deserving applicants will receive $1,500 toward their tuition and fee costs during their first year attending post-secondary schools. Scholarships will be awarded based on the following criteria: Academics, School-Sponsored Activities, Community Service, Work Experience and an Essay.
More »

In the second installment of Spartan Athlete Spotlight, Athletic Director, Jeremey Cryan is checking in on the Girls Soccer team. Check out the video to meet senior teammates Anabel Sosa and Emily Meraz.
More »

a.span: Career Scoring Leader Osmani Signs As Preferred Walk-On At Creighton

div.p:
During the 2016-17 boys basketball season, junior Adem Osmani was starting to emerge as a leader for the Spartans, and they were beginning to turn a corner with success. However, on December 17 of that season, another Osmani made his debut in an Oak Lawn Community High School uniform, and that Osmani was freshman Sami.
More »
